name: .KICAD_SYM File Extension
summary: Learn about .KICAD_SYM files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open KICAD_SYM files with KiCad (version 5 and later). To open a KICAD_SYM file, select Preferences â†’ Manage Symbol Libraries, and on the Global Libraries tab, click the folder icon to add the library.

Since KICAD_SYM files store information in text format, you can open the files with text editors, such as Microsoft Notepad, Apple TextEdit, and Microsoft Visual Studio Code. However, opening the files with a text editor will not appear the same as opening them with KiCad.
